item.title: March 2018 Summary
item.description: Visited Montreal, March 2nd - 9th. Ran into & became friends with Jay (former FB intern) and Nolan (Jay’s roommate). Broke up with Angel. Felt lonely in a long time. Went to an Ectomorph techno concert on the 30th. Very inspiring analog set. Grabbed lunch with Hanna on April 2nd.

item.title: Sunday Problems
item.description: I make electronic music in my free time, under the name Sunday Problems, mainly house and techno. You can find them in all major streaming services. SoundCloud Spotify Tidal

item.title: Il Jae Lee
item.description: I am a programmer interested in distributed and intelligent systems. Below is a short summary of my past experiences. You can find more detailed information on my LinkedIn. Employment Facebook. Menlo Park, CA. (Incoming) July 2019. Facebook. New York City, NY. Summer 2018 intern. SalesforceIQ. Palo Alto, CA. Summer 2017 intern. Fountain. San Francisco, CA. Summer 2016 intern. Solidware. Seoul, South Korea. Summer 2015 intern. Education University of Michigan.
